value:
Proof that two Heroes bested a boss
on their journeys together. Serves as
a souvenir from their travels.

A shooting-star ornament from
Mareeta. Its beautiful shape glitters
from every angle.

A shooting-star ornament from
Mareeta. Its glittering edges remind
you of her sharp sword skills.

A thick chronicle of histories from
August. Do you think you could gain
its wisdom simply by holding it?

A thick chronicle of histories from
August. Is it just your imagination, or
has it become even more detailed?

A red bandana from Galzus. He must
have had it a long time—it appears a
little worn.

A red bandana from Galzus. Its
silver pattern is beautiful. Did he
himself receive it as a gift?

A pegasus-shaped charm from Karin.
Its Silesse craftsmanship is clear: the
ornate patterns were etched by hand.

A pegasus-shaped charm from Karin.
According to her, she felt a little more
confident holding this.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 5: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 5: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 5: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 5: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book VI, Chapter 5: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Foster daughter of Eyvel, mistress of Fiana.
The gleaming strength of Astra is hers, and
she is now beyond peer. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Thracia 776.

Former priest of Bragi; a thorough realist.
Teaches young Leif just what a hero truly is.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Lives the life of a mercenary, searching for
the daughter that was stolen from him. Both of
them carry the blood of Od, the Sword Saint.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Pegasus rider from Silesse searching for the
missing prince, Ced. She can face the most
trying battles with the support of her beloved
pegasus. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Although he was a priest of the Loptr Church,
his doubts drove him to risk his life to leave it.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Can unleash a strong Special in most
combat situations and also takes less
damage when her Special is ready.

After an ally's defeat, grants Special
cooldown count-2 and a follow-up
blocking effect to his support partner.

Has skills with high offensive potential
and a Special that restores HP. Can
also effectively get Atk/Spd+12!

Can get Atk/Def+11 when within
2 spaces of an ally and grant Atk/Def
to allies within 2 spaces.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-1. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat,
neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's
follow-up attacks and effects that prevent
unit's follow-up attacks, and after combat,
grants Special cooldown count-1.

Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

Grants Atk/Def+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat.

Grants Atk/Def+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat.

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts penalty
on foe's Atk/Res during combat = 5 + any
current penalty on each of those stats.
(Example: if foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts
Atk-12, for a net penalty of Atk-19 during
combat.) Calculates each stat penalty
independently.

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts penalty
on foe's Atk/Res during combat = 5 + any
current penalty on each of those stats.
(Example: if foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts
Atk-12, for a net penalty of Atk-19 during
combat.) Calculates each stat penalty
independently.

Calculates damage from staff like other weapons.
At start of turn, grants Atk/Def/Res+6 and the
following status to unit's support partner
(if any): "If unit initiates combat, unit makes
a guaranteed follow-up attack." At start of turn,
if at least one ally has been defeated, grants
Special cooldown count-2 and the following
status to unit's support partner (if any): "Foe
cannot make a follow-up attack."

Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. If unit's
Special is ready and unit's Spd > foe's Spd,
reduces damage from area-of-effect Specials
(excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by
percentage = difference between stats × 3
(max 30%). At the start of combat, if unit's
Special is ready and unit's Spd > foe's Spd,
reduces damage from attacks during combat
by percentage = difference between stats × 3
(max 30%). (Damage-reduction effects above
are considered non-Special effects, so skills
like Deadeye still apply.)

If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Def/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Def/Res during combat.
